question: {name} can peel {n1} {food}s a minute and saute {n2} {food}s in {t} minutes. How many minutes will it take her to peel and saute {total} {food}s if it takes {extra} seconds to wash each {food} before peeling it? Note that {name} can't work in parallel and needs to take a {bk}-minute break after peeling the {food}s before she can start sautéing them.
answer: total // n1 + (total // n2 * t) + (extra * total // 60) + bk
